Title: This Secret is Staying With Me! Ep.3
SubTitle: No Translation

Text: Grrr!

In the blink of an eye a figure suddenly lunges at
Epsilon from behind. She immediately dodges,
the shadow zipping past her at a phenomenal
speed.

*pant, pant* That was close. I immediately dropped to
the ground to avoid it, but what was that...?

Something black... Did it just come out of nowhere?
It couldn't have been...a person.

I have a strange...feeling... I haven't been able to
manipulate magic for a while... In fact, it feels like
magic is being drained from my body.

I can barely move, and my feet are wobbling. Is this
an early indication of...magic deficiency?

This must be why the slime suits of the unit members
looked like they had melted.

The slime suit is a suit that is formed by channeling
magic into the slime. The suit's defensive value is
equal to the amount of magic within it.

Without magic to support it, the suit's defenses are
greatly diminished. No wonder their suits couldn't
even maintain their shape.

If you are attacked in that state, you won't stand a
chance, even as a trained Shadow Garden member.

When I saw those slime suits...I should've realized
that...earlier.

From the outside, there's nothing unique about these
ruins... There's hardly any magic flowing... It's like a
forgotten place.

This place took me off guard. I had no idea it would
be like this...

Wow...if you evaded that attack, it means you are
different from the previous ones...
A man emerges from the darkness.

The fact that you're able to move under these
circumstances is impressive.

Who are you...? Wait, let me guess. You must be
a member of the Cult of Diablos.
How astute of you.

Yeah...I've heard of you before. You're that strange
organization that's destroying the Cult's bases and
messing up our plans. Shadow...something.

You...! Can't you at least get our name right?! We're
the Shadow Garden! We lurk in the darkness and
hunt down shadows!
You still have enough energy to crack jokes.

Hmm. The three before were stripped of their magic by
the power of my artifact and died instantly.

It seems like you're one of the leaders of this
"Shadow Garden." Gotta be careful with you.

But...if I get the head of a leader as a souvenir,
my artifact will be one step closer to perfection!

In fact, with that achievement I may even be able to
get appointed to the lowest rank of the Rounds!

Huh? An artifact...? Wait a minute, I don't sense any
artifacts being activated in the ruins at all.

Instead of releasing magic, maybe it's an artifact
that absorbs surrounding magic...?

You're a smart cookie. This robe I'm wearing is
infused with an artifact that absorbs magic.

Since its range is limited to my immediate vicinity,
it's impossible to detect from a distance! If I can
put it to practical use, I'll be world-famous—

Enough with this "practical use" and "implementation"
talk. It's still in the testing stage, right?

Limited to your immediate vicinity...? That's so
narrow! At least say it's the entirety of this site
or something.
U-Urg...

So, this site...is more like your own personal
testing facility rather than the Cult's, right?

Hey, so let me get this straight... You can't use
magic either...right?
Hehe, that's right.
Why...?

So you're asking if I was the one who killed the
Shadow Garden unit, right?

(What's with that laugh? Wait, I don't feel that he...
has any magic. Maybe he can't use magic at all?)
You're...just some buffoon who can't use magic!

Buffoon?! Even if I can't use magic, it's easy for me
to master artifacts with my superior intellect!

Besides...is battle only about using magic?
Check this out!
Grrr...
A black mass— Huge dogs emerge from the shadows.

That's...the shadow that attacked me earlier. I see...
instead of relying on magic, you have dogs trained
to fight for you.
Mere dogs...? They're weapons, my weapons.

Well...I wish Delta could hear you say that. I can't
promise you'd walk away in one piece, though.

Are you trying to buy some time? You're most likely
trying to plan out how to distance yourself from me,
but first, your magic...

I get it. The more time passes, the more my magic
gets drained...

(Huh...? Did something like black sweat...drip from
me? Wait a second...the drops are bigger than
before...)

(I can't even sustain the shape of my slime suit...
This is...really bad... I'm in big trouble...)

What's wrong? You seem to be in a panic. You should
just give in...
...Shut up.
What?!

Can't you see that I'm deep in thought right now?!
I don't have time to deal with you...so be quiet.
...O-Okay.

...Wait, what am I saying?! Why am I the one being
pressured?! I'm gonna let my dogs go to town
on you!
Rip her to shreds with your fangs and claws!
Grrarrrr!
(They're coming...!)

(Geez...I can't worry about that now... If I don't
act quick, the suit I've carefully prepared will
be ruined! This is not good!)

With a huge thud, a larger black mass falls to the
ground. The slime covering her body peels off.
No! I won't let it all go to waste here!
